house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1951 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) and approximately 2337 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include view, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Schwinger Realty, Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Fenced, French Doors, OutdoorLights, Walk-In Closet(s)
